title: The spy who changed the cold war
itunes:title: The spy who changed the cold war
itunes:subtitle: Bestselling historical author Ben Macintyre talks to us about his new book, The Spy and the Traitor, which tells the remarkable story of a KGB double agent who risked his life to help the west during the Cold War
description:
Bestselling historical author Ben Macintyre talks to us about his new book, The Spy and the Traitor, which tells the remarkable story of a KGB double agent who risked his life to help the west during the Cold War

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
